scripts.dev: yarn run angular-json --env=ddch-dev && ng serve -c dev

scripts.remove:lib: yarn remove sag-common sag-thule sag-auth sag-haynespro sag-currency sag-gtmotive sag-article-detail sag-article-list sag-in-context
